question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "A white person told me racism never existed before Obama got into office, therefore he made racism. How can people be this oblivious?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Sooooo \u2026 racism didn\u2019t exist \u2026 before Obama? Like, \u201cright before\u201d or \u201calways before\u201d? Which \u201cbefore\u201d does this omnibus genius mean? Like \u201cbefore, even back in the 50\u2019s when African Americans were being murdered by burning to death?\u201d Or, \u201cJust only maybe 15 minutes before Obama became president?\u201d", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Obama sure brought out a lot of racism \u2026 ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "by being the first black president. ", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "Back when my dad was a boy (per him), they had a saying, \u201cThat pisses me off more than seeing a rich nigger.\u201d That is: ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "Black people are acceptable as long as they\u2019re poor and subservient. Then my delusions of superiority are confirmed. But put one in power, give him wealth, give him equality (god for bid superiority) and watch white people complain about the world!", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "There\u2019s a chorus on the far right that is accurate in pointing out that there is a lot more racial tension now, but not because of blacks, but because blacks are tired of being swept aside. Inspired by a black president, they\u2019ve started acting up and fighting against the systemic racism that they\u2019ve been generally turning a blind-eye to. Some white people, content in their echo chambers and unmolested by white men residing in the WHITE HOUSE, felt that since they weren\u2019t seeing the racism with their own eyes, that things were getting better. Because, well, as long as they couldn\u2019t see it, I guess it was okay. This is classic \u201c1950\u2019s mentality\u201d. Hide the problem, sweep it under the rug. Leave it in the past. Just \u2026 let\u2019s not talk about it.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Lastly, there is one big difference. Something different about our world today than pre 2008. We are so used to rapid technological changes that we are so accustomed to this thing in our life that wasn\u2019t there before. We have this thing on us all the time now. It captures images and voice with incredible clarity. It never goes away and that thing can move the images and voice and video to the internet with speeds unimaginable just 10 years ago. Because of that thing, no matter where a cop goes, he\u2019s being watched by the whole world. That power didn\u2019t exist by the billions before Obama. It does today. Because of that power, white people cannot deny what happens to black people all the time and black people now know that they were right all along and it\u2019s available for your viewing pleasure just a few clicks away.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-23a89c5d323ea30b373e77b96eff5b42.webp", "height": 332, "width": 500, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-23a89c5d323ea30b373e77b96eff5b42-c", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}]}
